name: Arena (itch) (BuffSandwichSoftware)
description:
Welcome to Arena --- a 1-bit spaceship survival game. 

Play through the campaign to unlock a handful of ship types, each with their own unlockable modifiers. Once unlocked this can be used in the Endless mode. Both modes track two types of highscores: time and points. 

If you feel any ships have an edge, it's up to you to make use of it. 

Also available on Google Play (free with ads): 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.buffsandwichsoftware.arena
